Body:
"""Test modify_storage_group_snapshot."""
snapshot_info, sg_name = self.create_sg_snapshot()
old_name = snapshot_info.get('name')
self.replication.modify_storage_group_snapshot(src_storage_grp_id=sg_name,
    tgt_storage_grp_id=None, snap_name=old_name, new_name='newname', gen_num=0)
snap_list = self.replication.get_storagegroup_snapshot_list(storagegroup_id
    =sg_name)
self.assertEqual('newname', snap_list[0])
self.replication.modify_storage_group_snapshot(src_storage_grp_id=sg_name,
    tgt_storage_grp_id=None, snap_name='newname', new_name=old_name, gen_num=0)
